description: This file defines the interface for the Device Communication Watchdog component, including callback function types, function prototypes for initialization, termination, configuration, and device monitoring control.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogInit
methods.description: Initializes the communication watchdog with callbacks for failure and restoration events.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogTerm
methods.description: Terminates and cleans up the communication watchdog.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogSetMonitorInterval
methods.description: Sets the interval for monitoring devices, useful for testing.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogMonitorDevice
methods.description: Starts monitoring a specific device identified by UUID with a specified failure timeout.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogStopMonitoringDevice
methods.description: Stops monitoring a device specified by UUID.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogPetDevice
methods.description: Resets the watchdog timer for a device to prevent false failure reports.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogForceDeviceInCommFail
methods.description: Forces a device into a communication failure state for testing or other purposes.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogGetRemainingCommFailTimeoutForLPM
methods.description: Returns the remaining communication failure timeout for Low Power Mode (LPM).

methods.name: deviceCommunicationWatchdogResetTimeoutForDevice
methods.description: Resets the communication failure timeout for a device.
